International House Prices

Source: vignettes/house-prices.Rmd
house-prices.Rmd
library(exuber)
options(exuber.show_progress = FALSE)

library(gridExtra)
library(dplyr)

Download file

dataURL <- "https://www.dallasfed.org/~/media/documents/institute/houseprice/hp1803.xlsx"
temp <- "hp.xlsx"
download.file(dataURL, destfile = temp, mode = 'wb')
rhpi <- readxl::read_excel(temp, sheet = 3)
rpdi <- readxl::read_excel(temp, sheet = 5)

Wrangle

price <-
  rhpi %>%
  slice(-1) %>% 
  rename(Date = 1) %>% 
  mutate(Date = Date %>% lubridate::yq()) %>% 
  select( -25) %>% 
  na.omit()

Estimation

radf_price <- 
  price %>% 
  radf(lag = 1)

Contents

  • Download file
  • Wrangle
  • Estimation
